wikipedia_page.main: Glen Dudbridge FBA (1938 – 5 February 2017) was a British Sinologist, specialising in the literature and religious culture of China, ranging between the eighth and seventeenth centuries AD, with particular attention to narrative traditions and to vernacular culture.

link_mentions.page: Joseph Needham Professor of Chinese History, Science, and Civilization

response: * 1999 Glen Dudbridge: Lost books of medieval China
